concept.title: Case
concept.shortdesc: A case with instructions to create a line graph with various adjustments.

example.title: Case Stock Quotes
example.p: You can see the average monthly stock price of four companies for the months January through March in the following figure:
Create a line chart from these data.Stocks.xlsx

At a later stage, the entries for April are published: Average prices April
Average prices April
This data should be added at a later moment to the chart.

The final result should look like this Chart with average monthly stock prices
Chart with average monthly stock prices

ul.li: Data for January through April are in the practice file.
Chart type is a line chart (line with markers)
When you create a chart Excel takes the rows as data series instead of the columns. Change this situation by switching rows / columns.
Add chart title. Format the text of the title in Palatino, 14 pt, bold.
Scale the vertical axis so that the primary unit is10.
Put a legend under the horizontal axis and stretch the legend so that all texts are in a row.
